stimulusHtml: The best method to understand the causal effect of a reward on an intrinsically motivated behavior is to
choicesHtml: conduct an experiment in which intrinsic motivation for a behavior is tested prior to administering a reward for that same behavior in a random sample of the participants and then measure the motivation after the reward is taken away
conduct a cross-sectional study in which a large sample of individuals are interviewed extensively about their intrinsic motivation for a behavior and the effect of rewards
conduct an experiment where a random sample of the participants are given a reward for a given behavior and measure whether the behavior increases
conduct a correlational study where the relationship between participantsâ€™ self-reported intrinsic motivation for a behavior is correlated with the rewards they receive for that behavior
